name: A. Puzzle Pieces
statement:
You are given a special jigsaw puzzle consisting of n
cdot m identical pieces. Every piece has three tabs and one blank, as
pictured below. The jigsaw puzzle is considered solved if the following
conditions hold: The pieces are arranged into a grid with n rows and m
columns. For any two pieces that share an edge in the grid, a tab of one
piece fits perfectly into a blank of the other piece. Through rotation
and translation of the pieces, determine if it is possible to solve the
jigsaw puzzle.
